title: Vectra Audit Insights
description: This dashboard provides comprehensive visibility into Vectra audit activity, enabling monitoring of system and user actions, analysis of event outcomes, user roles, and source locations, and detailed audit logs for investigation and compliance.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides comprehensive visibility into Vectra audit activity, enabling monitoring of system and user actions, analysis of event outcomes, user roles, and source locations, and detailed audit logs for investigation and compliance.

For more information, see the [Vectra Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/vectra/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.
This group provides a high-level view of audit activity, highlighting total audit events, trends over time, and the most common audit actions for quick visibility.

This group provides detailed insights into audit activity, including successful and failed events, user and role-based actions, affected objects, source IP distribution, and complete audit event records.

definition.title: Events by result status over time
